title: Strawberry Burst SKE Crystal Plus Prefilled Pods
description: The Crystal Bar Plus Strawberry Burst pods, are pre-filled with 2ml e-liquid and deliver approx. 600 puffs, similar to 20 cigarettes. These are compatible with the Crystal Plus pod kit. They're filled with 20mg salt-based nicotine strength to deliver a smooth throat hit and faster body absorption compared to standard e-liquid. Strawberry Burst is a sweet and fruity flavour that will tantalize your taste buds with every puff. The succulent sweetness of ripe strawberries is perfectly balanced with a blend of red berries, with each puff offering a juicy flavour that will leave you wanting more. The taste is sweet and tart, with a refreshing coolness that lingers on the tongue. The 1.2ohm coil is also pre-installed and creates a smooth tight draw similar to a cigarette while producing a small amount of vapour and retaining the great flavour. Featuring a 1.1 Ohm built-in meshed coil known for consistent and rich flavour delivery from first to last draw. Plus, you can enjoy MTL-style vaping with these pods that mimic the feel of traditional cigarettes. Being pre-filled with e-liquid, there is no need to need to refill the pods or go through any messy coil changes. Once the Eliquid has run out, just dispose of the empty pod and install a new one. Strawberry Burst Crystal Plus Pods Features: 2ml E-Liquid Capacity 20mg salt-based nicotine Up to 600 Puff Inhale-activated Pre-filled pods 1.1 Ohm Meshed Coil MTL Draw SKE Crystal Plus Pods Package Contents: 2 x Crystal Plus pre-filled pods
